text: Her onginð seo endebyrdnesse, hu man ymb þone mettruman don sceal, þonne man gesihð, þæt he his forðsiðe genealæceð.
Þonne þam untruman seo tid his forðsiðes onhigað, þonne gesamnian him to godcundes hades men.

Þonne seðe on þære geferredenne gesceadwisost sy, cweðe to þam mettruman, þæt he þæt drihtenlice gebed ærost singe, þæt ispater nosterand þærto his riht geleaffulnesse, þæt isCredo in deum, gif he cunne.

And gif he þonne ne cunne, þonne onwreo se sacerd him be þæs fyrstes mæðe, þe him þincð, þæt he wite hwæt sy riht geleaffulnes, þæt is, þæt he sceal gelyfan, þæt fæder and sunu and se halga gast is an God and þæt he sceal on domesdæge mid sawle and lichaman arisan and æt Godes dome standan and þær ealra þæra weorca edlean underfon, þe he her on worulde ær gefremode.
And þonne he þis þus gedon hæfð, þonne sylle he him haliges husles þigene and syððan mid gedreoge hine unscrydan, þonne he gewiten bið.

And þa, ðe þær ætstandað, hine eastwardne astreccan and on þære hæran alecgan and æfter þam hine utan besittan and þa eagan belecgan and þone muð belucan and gif he belocen beon nylle, þonne befo man þa ceacan up to þam heafde mid sumam bende and þa sawle mid lofsange Gode bebeodan.
And þæs lofsanges angin þus sceal beon gelogod, þæt is, þonne syððan hy hine utan betrymedne habbað, sprenge man halig wæter ofer þone untruman.
